text: Tomara tomadera samartha?2437;Nuyayi yerupa grhe basa kara, taderake'o basabasera jan'ye serupa grha da'o. Taderake kasta diye sankatapanna karo na. Yadi tara garbhabati haya, tabe santanaprasaba paryanta tadera byayabhara bahana karabe. Yadi tara tomadera santanaderake stan'yadana kare, tabe taderake prapya parisramika debe ebam e samparke paraspara sanyatabhabe paramarsa karabe. Tomara yadi paraspara jeda kara, tabe an'ya nari stan'yadana karabe.
